name: quotation to sales order convert
query:
SELECT
    CONCAT(YEAR(`tabQuotation`.`transaction_date`), '-', MONTHNAME(`tabQuotation`.`transaction_date`)) as `year_month`,
    COUNT(DISTINCT `tabQuotation`.`name`) as `total_quotations`,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN `tabSales Order`.`name` IS NOT NULL THEN `tabQuotation`.`name` END) as `converted_quotations`
FROM
    `tabQuotation`
LEFT JOIN
    `tabSales Order Item` ON `tabQuotation`.`name` = `tabSales Order Item`.`prevdoc_docname`
LEFT JOIN
    `tabSales Order` ON `tabSales Order Item`.`parent` = `tabSales Order`.`name`
WHERE
    `tabQuotation`.`docstatus` = 1
GROUP BY
    `year_month`
ORDER BY
    `tabQuotation`.`transaction_date` DESC;
